pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api

Interface DataController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionController

    public interface DataController
extends ConfigurationAware
    Data controller processes incoming text and binary data. Each non control message sent by user is forwarded to data controller implementation. There might be multiple active data controllers, from which connecting clients choose one they wish to communicate with.

    Created on: 2011-07-19 15:18:15

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec
    See Also:
    Action Data Controller
